name: Tizahl's Quest (SorceressGameLab)
description:
Tizahl's Quest is an action RPG in a 3D lowpoly world! If you have played Diablo or Titan Quest you should feel right at home. Explore dungeons, kill monsters, collect loot and find magic!

Key features:

- dungeons portals: every portal leads to a different dungeon with a boss at the end. Kill the boss to unlock the next dungeon!

- magic abilities: along the journey unlock new magic abilities to fight your enemies!

- quests: talk to NPCs to solve quests and gain rare items!

- zoom in/out/rotate camera: I included a zoom in/out and rotating camera for better view!

Controls:

Mouse+Keyboard.

Hold left mouse button: move player, interact with world, UI

Mouse wheel: Zoom in/out

Left + Right arrow keys: rotate camera

Keyboard: 

Escape: Pause menu/Quit game

I = Inventory

T = Character window

Number pad 1-6 : action bar

Future Plans:

Will definitely post updates with fixes/improvements. If more than expected downloads should happen I will add more dungeons and multiplayer!
